name: Token Teknoloji A.Ş. Token DeFi
description: Token DeFi (TDEFI), launched by Token Teknoloji A.Ş., in 2022, is a thematic basket token that includes multiple cryptocurrencies. This innovative token represents a portfolio of the best DeFi tokens that are weighted by experts. TDEFI offers its investors an easy and secure way to take the leap into the DeFi world. Due to its structure which includes various DeFi tokens, TDEFI makes it possible to trade a whole portfolio of DeFi coins with a single click of a button. With this structure, TDEFI is able to minimise the commission fee costs incurred when trading a large number of cryptocurrencies and creates the opportunity to manage a DeFi portfolio not only more easily but also more cost-effectively. TDEFI, which has advantages such as simple trading, effective market monitoring and low cost, was created on Avax C-Chain. The cryptocurrencies contained in TDEFI and their weights are regularly shared transparently on token.com.tr.
